Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Called the REDt-1 (rapid exosphere direct transport).

Carries 6 kerbals (two of which are pilots).

Doesn't have great dV in orbit, but enough to make maneuvers.

Stock + MechJeb.

To do:

-slightly more liquid fuel.

-RCS or more torque.

-Solar panels.

-Batteries in a different location (they are supposedly shielded, but they are the first parts to overheat.

Edited May 21, 2015 by lolstock
